About Me

BIO

  • I am the Founder & CEO of Kikbits Pvt Ltd, A Software Development Services Providing Company.

  • Kikbits started with merely a simple freelancing profile on upwork, which ultimately became a Top Rated Plus profile, maintaining a 100% Job Success Score with all 5 star rated projects.

  • My professional career humbly begun by providing consultancy to the top-notch telecommunication companies of Pakistan as Oracle Fusion MiddleWare Consultant.

  • Working for Large enterprises and some very succesful start-ups has helped me attain a unique set of leadership and technical abilities, which I have used strategically for success of my clients and Kikbits.

  • I have a strong hold on chrome extensions API, I use ReactJS for Front-end and Django-python for backend support that helps me greatly in leading Full-Stack projects for my clients.

  • I am always looking to work on interesting project ideas and if you have one and would like to discuss, please do reach out to me at bilal@kikbits.com
